item.title: Onitsuka Tiger considering India as manufacturing hub for regional growth | Company Business News - Mint
item.description:
Onitsuka Tiger Considering India as Manufacturing Hub for Regional Growth

Publication Date: N/A Source: Mint

Japanese footwear brand Onitsuka Tiger, part of Asics Corporation, is contemplating India as a potential manufacturing hub to hasten its growth in the region.

“Establishing a manufacturing base in India is a strategic move that can significantly accelerate Onitsuka Tiger’s growth in the region. India’s market potential for premium footwear and apparel is growing rapidly, and setting up local manufacturing will add value,” Ryoji Shoda, vice-president of Onitsuka Tiger.
  • Onitsuka Tiger aims to enhance regional growth through local manufacturing in India.
  • The vice-president noted the rapid growth of India's premium footwear and apparel market.
  • A strategic manufacturing base in India could add significant value to the brand.

The potential establishment of a manufacturing hub in India reflects Onitsuka Tiger's commitment to tapping into one of the fastest-growing markets for premium goods in Asia.

item.title: OnePlus 13, Samsung Galaxy S25 And More: Big Phone Launches Coming In January 2025 - News18
item.description:
OnePlus 13, Samsung Galaxy S25 And More: Big Phone Launches Coming In January 2025

Date: December 30, 2024

Source: News18

The tech world is gearing up for a series of significant smartphone launches in January 2025, including offerings from OnePlus, Samsung, and Xiaomi.

Key Launches to Expect:

  • OnePlus 13: Launching on January 7, featuring an upgraded design and specifications including an X2 OLED display and Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset.
  • Xiaomi Pad 7 and Redmi 14C: Affordable 5G device expected to support dual-SIM networks and a 50MP camera.
  • Samsung Galaxy S25 Series: Set to introduce flagship models in the competitive premium market.
  • Poco X7 Series: Launching on January 9, focusing on performance and value.
"The OnePlus 13 looks less-curvier thanks to the flat frame, providing a modern aesthetic along with upgraded features such as an IP69 rating for water resistance."

As the new year arrives, tech enthusiasts are anticipating these exciting advancements in smartphone technology.

item.title: Poco X7 Series India Launch Date Set For January 9; Flipkart Availability Confirmed - Gadgets 360
item.description:
Poco X7 Series Launch in India Confirmed for January 9

Date & Source: January 9, 2024, Gadgets 360

Poco X7 series will launch in India on January 9 at 5:30pm IST, according to an X post by the company. The promotional poster confirms that the upcoming smartphones will be available for purchase in the country via Flipkart.

  • The base Poco X7 is expected to arrive alongside a Pro variant.
  • The base version will likely get a MediaTek Dimensity 7300-Ultra chipset, and the Pro variant is said to get a MediaTek Dimensity 8400-Ultra SoC.
  • Poco India Head Himanshu Tandon confirmed that there will not be a 'Neo' variant in the lineup.
According to a leak, the base Poco X7 could sport a 6.67-inch AMOLED display with 1.5K resolution and a 120Hz refresh rate.

Related Stories:

  • Poco X7 Pro 5G Global Variant Design Renders, Key Specifications Leaked; Said to Get 6,000mAh Battery
  • Poco X7 5G Design Renders, Colour Options, Key Features Surface Online
  • Poco X7 Global Variant Spotted on Geekbench With Support For 12GB RAM

item.title: POCO M7 Pro 5G Review: Hits all the right notes - CNBCTV18
item.description:
POCO M7 Pro 5G Review: Hits all the right notes

Date & Source: March 2024, CNBC TV18


Introduction: The POCO M7 Pro 5G offers a premium design, immersive display, solid performance, and excellent battery life at an affordable price.

  1. Design: Robust build with a two-tone finish, IP64 rating, and practical features.
  2. Display: Vibrant 6.78-inch FHD+ AMOLED with 120Hz refresh rate.
  3. Performance: Smooth and responsive with minor frame drops, preloaded with bloatware.
  4. Battery: 5,110mAh with 45W fast charging.
  5. Cameras: Good daylight performance, average low-light, and sharp selfies.

Notable Quote: "The POCO M7 Pro 5G is a thoughtfully designed smartphone that punches above its weight."

Conclusion: A great budget-friendly device that doesn't skimp on essential features, with a minor downside of preloaded bloatware.

item.title: Redmi Turbo 4 aka Poco X7 Pro, world’s first Dimensity 8400 powered phone, to launch on January 2, 2025 - The Financial Express
item.description:
Xiaomi's Redmi Turbo 4: World's First Phone with MediaTek Dimensity 8400 Processor

Published on December 31, 2024, by Financial Express

Xiaomi's sub-brand Redmi is set to unveil the Redmi Turbo 4 on January 2, 2025, in China. This smartphone is of particular interest as it will be the first in the world to feature the new MediaTek Dimensity 8400 processor. The full design of the device has been revealed, showcasing a sporty, racecar-inspired look with a flat chassis and a plastic frame.

  • The Redmi Turbo 4 will sport a 6.67-inch LTPS OLED display with FHD+ resolution and a 120Hz refresh rate.
  • It will be powered by the MediaTek Dimensity 8400 processor, featuring an 8-core Cortex-A725 CPU with a maximum clock speed of 3.25GHz, Mali-G720 GPU, and Imagiq 1080 ISP.
  • The device will come with a 50-megapixel primary camera with optical image stabilization and a 6,550mAh battery with 90W charging.
  • Redmi has confirmed that the Turbo 4 will also launch globally as the Poco X7 Pro.
Redmi has revealed the full design of the Turbo 4 to build hype around the impending launch.

Follow FE Tech Bytes on Twitter, Instagram, LinkedIn, and Facebook for more updates.

item.title: iPhone SE 4 price leaked ahead of launch: Here’s what we know so far - CNBCTV18
item.description:
iPhone SE 4 price leaked ahead of launch: Here’s what we know so far

Date: Dec 30, 2024

Source: CNBC TV18

Apple’s upcoming iPhone SE 4, anticipated to launch in early 2025, is generating buzz due to recent price leaks suggesting a competitive pricing strategy aimed at undercutting its predecessor.

  • The expected launch price of the iPhone SE 4 could be around $500 or lower, according to leaks.
  • It may feature Apple's in-house 5G modem, potentially reducing manufacturing costs.
  • Anticipated specifications include a 6.1-inch OLED display, a 48MP rear camera, and a 24MP front camera.
  • The iPhone SE 4 is expected to adopt USB-C charging ports in compliance with EU regulations.
  • Powered by the A18 processor with 8GB of RAM, it aims to enhance performance and support advanced capabilities.
“This would be the first update to the iPhone SE model since 2022, when Apple added 5G capability to the device.”

The iPhone SE 4 aims to offer a combination of affordability and high-end features, appealing to users looking for a budget-friendly option with modern capabilities.

item.title: Best smart TV: Top 10 options for superior viewing and smart features at home in 2024 - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Top 10 Smart TVs in 2024

Date & Source: December 30, 2024, Hindustan Times

Smart TVs have evolved, offering superior entertainment with seamless streaming and smart features. Explore the top 10 smart TVs in 2024 for enhanced viewing and smart capabilities.

  • LG 32LM563BPTC: Vibrant HD visuals, WebOS, AI ThinQ, and voice command support.
  • LG 32LQ643BPTA: Advanced WebOS, AI-powered features, and built-in apps.
  • Xiaomi Smart TV A: Stunning HD visuals, Android TV, Chromecast, and Google Assistant integration.
  • Samsung UA43T5450AKXXL: Full HD clarity, Tizen OS, and PurColour technology.
  • Samsung UA32T4380AKXXL: Vibrant HD visuals, Tizen OS, and glossy black finish.
  • VW32S Frameless Smart TV: Vibrant HD visuals, Android OS, Google Assistant, and frameless design.
  • Redmi Xiaomi F Series Fire TV: HD-ready clarity, Fire OS, Alexa integration, and customisable interface.
  • Redmi Xiaomi F Series 4K Fire TV: Stunning UHD visuals, Fire OS, Alexa voice control, and immersive display.
  • VW43F2 Playwall Frameless Smart TV: Full HD clarity, Android OS, Google Assistant, and Chromecast support.
  • Panasonic TH32MS660DX: Sharp HD visuals, Google TV interface, Google Assistant, and Chromecast.

Why choose these products?
  • LG TVs offer reliable technology, rich features, and seamless streaming.
  • Xiaomi provides excellent value for money with its Google-powered interface and bezel-less design.
  • Samsung ensures superior picture quality, intuitive smart features, and trusted quality.
  • VW and Redmi Xiaomi offer versatile features, customisable interfaces, and extensive streaming options.
  • Panasonic delivers reliable performance and user-friendly Google TV interface.

Disclaimer: At Hindustan Times, we help you stay up-to-date with the latest trends and products. Hindustan Times has an affiliate partnership, so we may get a part of the revenue when you make a purchase. We shall not be liable for any claim under applicable laws, including but not limited to the Consumer Protection Act, 2019, concerning the products. The products listed in this article are in no particular order of priority.

item.title: Apple Days Sale: iPhone buyers rejoice, huge discounts across Apple ecosystem - India TV News
item.description:
Apple Days Sale: Huge Discounts on iPhones and More

Date: December 29, 2024 - January 5, 2025
Source: India TV News

The Apple Days Sale is offering fantastic discounts on a variety of Apple products, including iPhones, in celebration of the New Year. The sale runs from December 29, 2024, to January 5, 2025, at Vijay Sales.

  • Discounts on iPhone 13, 14, 15, 16, and other Apple products.
  • iPhone 16 starting at Rs 66,900 with bank discounts available.
  • iPhone 15 available from Rs 57,490; iPhone 14 at Rs 48,990.
  • Lowest price ever for iPhone 13: Rs 42,900.
  • 10th Gen iPad for Rs 29,499, iPad Air for Rs 50,499.
"This sale is a great opportunity for Apple enthusiasts with significant price cuts and bank discounts."

This sale presents a prime opportunity for consumers looking to purchase Apple products at reduced prices, making it a noteworthy event for the tech community.

item.title: Xiaomi 15 Ultra Tipped to Go Official in March During MWC 2025 - Gadgets 360
item.description:
Xiaomi 15 Ultra Expected to Launch in March 2025 During MWC

Publication Date: December 26, 2024 | Source: Gadgets 360

The Xiaomi 15 Ultra is anticipated to be the third model in the Xiaomi 15 series, expected to unveil during the Mobile World Congress (MWC) 2025 in Barcelona, running from March 3 to March 6. Hints from company President Lu Weibing suggest a strong focus on high-end features.

  • Expected to feature Snapdragon 8 Elite chipset
  • 200-megapixel large-aperture periscope telephoto sensor
  • Rumored IP68 and IP69 waterproof ratings
  • Launch date speculated for March 2, 2025
  • Possibility of satellite connectivity and 90W wired charging
“The Xiaomi 15 Ultra will appear during MWC 2025, likely on March 2.” - Lu Weibing

This new device aims to continue Xiaomi's tradition of pushing technological boundaries, as seen with previous models.

item.title: OnePlus 12, 12R prices dropped by Rs 10,000 ahead of OnePlus 13, 13R launch: Details - The Financial Express
item.description:
OnePlus 12, 12R prices dropped by Rs 10,000 ahead of OnePlus 13, 13R launch: Details

Publication Date: December 17, 2024 | Source: Financial Express

The OnePlus 13 series, launching on January 7, 2025, sees significant price reductions for previous models, the OnePlus 12 and 12R, offering users a chance to buy at discounted rates.

  • OnePlus 12 price now at ₹54,998 after a ₹10,001 discount.
  • OnePlus 12R available at a reduced price of ₹36,590, offering a discount of ₹3,409.
  • Event for OnePlus 13 series watchable online at 9 PM IST on January 7, 2025.
  • OnePlus 13 available in colors: Midnight Ocean, Black Eclipse, and Arctic Dawn.
  • OnePlus 13R to be released in Nebula Noir and Astral Trail options.
"The keynote will kick off at 9:00 PM in India on January 7, 2025."

This price drop comes strategically ahead of the launch, making it an attractive opportunity for consumers looking to purchase high-performance smartphones.

item.title: WhatsApp fights fake news with reverse image search: How to use new feature update - The Financial Express
item.description:
WhatsApp's New Weapon Against Fake News: Reverse Image Search

Date & Source: Published on Oct 28, 2024, by Financial Express

Introduction: WhatsApp is set to roll out a new feature to combat fake news by allowing users to search for images directly on Google from WhatsApp Web.

  1. Users can now upload images from WhatsApp to Google Image Search to verify their authenticity.
  2. This feature will help users determine if an image has been manipulated or misused.
  3. It's a convenient and secure way to detect deceptive content and prevent the spread of misinformation.
Why it's important: The spread of fake images has led to various online scams. This feature helps users cross-check images before responding, preventing them from falling victim to malicious schemes.

Conclusion: WhatsApp's reverse image search feature is a significant step towards combating fake news and misinformation, providing users with a convenient and secure tool to verify images.

item.title: What’s New with AI #52. Google Gemini 2.0 Flash Thinking… | by Knowlab | Dec, 2024 - Medium
item.description:
What’s New with AI #52

Publication Date: Not available Source: Medium

This article reviews recent advancements in AI, highlighting several new models and partnerships that are pushing the boundaries of technology.

  • Google Gemini 2.0 Flash Thinking Experimental: A model known for its accuracy and detailed responses, ranking #1 on Chatbot Arena.
  • Genesis Open-Source Physics Engine: Running 43 million FPS for ultra-fast simulations, fully open-source and Python-based.
  • Google + Apptronik Partnership: Advancing humanoid robots like Apollo for industrial tasks.
  • DeepSeek V3: Outperforming GPT-4 and Llama 3.1 in coding tasks, developer-friendly.
  • Meta’s Movie Gen AI: A tool for editing videos with text prompts, set to launch on Instagram in 2025.

item.title: Gadgets Weekly: Vivo Y29 5G and more - Deccan Herald
item.description:
Tech Weekly: New Launches and Initiatives

Date & Source: Published on 30 December 2024, 10:45 IST, Deccan Herald

Introduction: This week (December 16-22, 2024) saw several new product launches in the tech industry, including phones, accessories, and more.

  1. Vivo Y29 5G: A budget-friendly 5G smartphone with impressive features like a 6.68-inch HD+ display, MediaTek Dimensity 6300 processor, and a 5,500mAh battery with 44W charging speed.
  2. Lava Yuva 2 5G: An affordable 5G smartphone with a 6.67-inch HD+ display, Unisoc T760 processor, and a 5,000mAh battery.
  3. Zeb-Axon 200 Bluetooth speaker: A rugged, portable speaker with 180W RMS output, RGB lights, and an IPX6 rating.
  4. Goldmedal Electricals steam and dry iron series: New irons with triple-coated and Weilburger non-stick soleplates, convenient controls, and a 360-degree swivel cord.
  5. Xiaomi Xplorers Programme: Xiaomi's initiative to reward and recognize innovative tech projects in India.
  6. Whirlpool and PG Electroplas to bring co-branded washing machines: Whirlpool and PG Electroplas partner to manufacture select models of Whirlpool-branded semi-automatic washing machines.
  7. Vivo Ignite: Technology and Innovation Initiative: Vivo's competition to encourage and reward innovative tech solutions aligned with the Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs).
  8. Samsung to launch new line of ACs in 2025 in India: Samsung plans to introduce over a dozen inverter Air Conditioners with proprietary Bespoke Artificial Intelligence features.

“The T&I Initiative is more than just a competition – it’s a commitment to building a future where innovation and sustainability go hand-in-hand.” - Geetaj Channana, Head of Corporate Strategy, Vivo India

Conclusion: This week's tech launches and initiatives offer a mix of affordable devices, innovative solutions, and partnerships, catering to various consumer needs and interests.

item.title: Redmi 14C 5G display, colours options confirmed ahead of India launch - 91mobiles
item.description:
Redmi 14C 5G Display and Color Options Ahead of Launch

Publication Date: January 6th
Source: 91mobiles

The Redmi 14C 5G is set to launch in India, confirming display specifications and color options.

Key Points

  • The Redmi 14C 5G will feature a 6.88-inch display with a 120Hz refresh rate and HD+ resolution.
  • It will also have a TÜV Rheinland certification for eye safety.
  • Available in three colors: Starlight Blue, Stardust Purple, and Stargaze Black.
  • The smartphone supports dual 5G SIM and is equipped with a 50MP main camera.
  • Powered by Qualcomm Snapdragon 4 Gen 2 SoC with up to 8GB RAM and Android 14 OS.
  • Expected to feature a 5,160mAh battery with 18W charging support.
“The Redmi 13C 5G was one of the cheapest 5G smartphones in India.”

The Redmi 14C 5G is anticipated to be affordably priced, following the trend set by its predecessor.

item.title: Telangana CM, IT Minister meet Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella in Hyderabad - The Hindu
item.description:
Telangana Leaders Meet with Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella in Hyderabad

Date & Source: December 30, 2024, The Hindu

Telangana Chief Minister A. Revanth Reddy, IT and Industries Minister D. Sridhar Babu, and other officials met with Microsoft CEO Satya Nadella in Hyderabad on Monday (December 30, 2024). The meeting discussed the expansion of Microsoft's data centers in the city and Nadella's recent visit to his alma mater.

  1. The IT Minister had previously requested Microsoft representatives to complete the expansion of their data centers by the end of 2025.
  2. Hyderabad-born Satya Nadella recently participated in the centenary celebrations at his alma mater, Hyderabad Public School.
"In a meeting with representatives of the global giant a few months ago, the IT Minister requested them to complete expansion of their data centres near the city by the end of 2025."

Published - December 30, 2024 04:09 pm IST

item.title: Google Chrome browser extensions hacked: How it happened and tips to stay secure - The Indian Express
item.description:
Google Chrome browser extensions hacked: How it happened and tips to stay secure

Publication Date: December 27, 2023 | Source: Cyberhaven

A series of Google Chrome browser extensions have been compromised in a large-scale hacking campaign, exposing user data that could allow hackers to steal credentials and bypass two-factor authentication.

Key Points

  • The cyber attack was first confirmed by Cyberhaven, with 26 extensions identified as compromised.
  • Malicious code was injected into existing extensions, exploiting their permissions.
  • Attackers used a phishing campaign disguised as communication from Google Chrome Web Store to gain access.
  • Cyberhaven recommends protecting developer accounts, using HTTPS, requesting minimal permissions, and sanitizing inputs to enhance security.
  • Users are advised to uninstall compromised extensions and scan their systems for malware.
“After the customary Chrome Web Store Security review process, the malicious extension was approved for publication,” - Howard Ting, CEO of Cyberhaven.

item.title: 5 Apple Intelligence features to arrive in 2025 - India Today
item.description:
5 Apple Intelligence Features Set to Launch in 2025

Publication Date: Not specified Source: India Today

Apple is preparing to enhance its Apple Intelligence capabilities with several new features that will be rolled out in 2025, following the iOS 18.2 update.

  • Priority Notifications: A new feature that allows users to see important notifications first.
  • New Siri Capabilities: Siri will gain support for personal context and deeper app integration.
  • GenMoji: This feature, previously exclusive to iPhones and iPads, will be introduced to macOS in early 2025.
  • Memory Movies: Apple plans to bring the memory movies feature to Macs, currently available only on iOS devices.
  • Multi-lingual Support: New support for various languages will be added, enhancing user accessibility worldwide.
“Apple Intelligence will have Priority Notifications so you can see what's important first.”

These improvements are expected to significantly enhance user experience, making Apple devices even more intuitive and responsive to user needs.

item.title: WhatsApp to stop working on these Android phones from January 1: Check the full list - India Today
item.description:
WhatsApp to Stop Working on Over 20 Older Android Phones from January 1, 2025

Published On: Dec 30, 2024 by Aman Rashid

Starting January 1, 2025, WhatsApp will cease to function on over 20 outdated Android smartphones, including models from Samsung, Motorola, HTC, LG, and Sony that run on Android KitKat or earlier.

  • WhatsApp is phasing out support for devices operating on Android 4.4 (KitKat) or earlier to ensure better security and functionality.
  • Affected devices include older models, many of which are nearly a decade old or more.
  • Brands like HTC and LG, which have stopped smartphone production, are among those impacted.
  • Users are advised to back up their chats to transition smoothly to newer phones.
“If you’re still using one of these phones, now might be the time to consider upgrading.”

item.title: Will GTA 6 Be Delayed? Here's How Rockstar-Owner Take Two Still Offers Hope For 2025 Release - ABP Live
item.description:
GTA 6 Release Timeline: Take-Two Confirms 2025 Launch, Hypes Upcoming Titles

Publication Date: Article Publish Date, Source: Abplive

GTA fans worldwide awaited the GTA 6 trailer on December 27, but it didn't materialize. However, Take-Two Interactive, Rockstar Games' parent company, has reassured fans that GTA 6 will indeed release in the fall of 2025.

Key Points

  • GTA 6 is confirmed to release in Q3/Q4 2025
  • Take-Two expects GTA 6 to set new industry benchmarks, following the success of GTA V (205 million copies) and Red Dead Redemption 2 (62 million copies)
  • Upcoming Take-Two titles include Civilization 7, WWE 2K25, Borderlands 4, and Mafia: The Old Country

Notable Quote

Strauss Zelnick, CEO of Take-Two Interactive: "With many exciting new titles coming in Fiscal 2026 – including Grand Theft Auto VI, Borderlands 4, and Mafia: The Old Country – we expect to create long-term value for our shareholders."

item.title: Soon, WhatsApp web will allow reverse image search through Google: Details - Business Standard
item.description:
WhatsApp Web to Introduce Reverse Image Search via Google

Date & Source: Dec 30 2024 | 3:00 PM IST, Business Standard

Meta is reportedly working with Google to tackle misinformation on WhatsApp. The reverse image search feature, first tested on Android, is now being explored for the WhatsApp web client. This feature will allow users to search an image on the web using Google, helping them gather more context and determine if the image has been manipulated. The feature is expected to be available soon on both WhatsApp Android app and WhatsApp Web.

  • The feature will allow users to upload a photo to Google to perform a reverse image search.
  • It is expected to be available on both WhatsApp Android app and WhatsApp Web in the coming weeks.
  • The feature is akin to Google's existing reverse image search but more convenient as it's integrated within WhatsApp.
While Meta has not officially confirmed the availability of the new reverse image search feature, it is expected to be available soon.

Source: Business Standard

item.title: Redmi Turbo 4 Launching on 2 January 2025: Expected Features and Expectations - The Quint
item.description:
Redmi Turbo 4 Launching on 2 January 2025: Expected Features and Expectations

Publication Date: Not specified
Source: The Quint

The Redmi Turbo 4 is set for launch in China on January 2, 2025, emphasizing its performance and gaming capabilities. The device will be available for reservations, with a global release expected as the POCO X7 Pro.

Key Points

  • Launch date confirmed for January 2, 2025, in China.
  • Design includes a dual rear camera setup and a vertical red line on the back.
  • Color options include off-white, black, and cyan.
  • Powered by the Dimensity 8400 Ultra processor, offering impressive performance scores.
  • Expected features include a 6.67-inch display, a dual rear camera of 50MP+8MP, and a 6,500mAh battery.
“Good-looking and good to play (able to fight)” - Gaming tagline from the launch poster featuring Fan Zhendong.

This launch signifies Xiaomi's continued focus on performance-oriented devices, catering to gaming enthusiasts.
